name: Jacob anderson
coverLetter: HI I'm Jacob but I go by Jakes thank you for taking your time to read this. I was a bud tender for 8 months at Divine Kind. I got laid off after we got bought out I have been doing triming the past 6 months plus ranging from wet to dry trim on multiple strains ranging from blue dream to train wreck. I have also been identifying powdery mildew and spider might and also bud rot. I can work any time and wish to keep learning more about growing.
